name: Stone Simulator 2021
description:
In the Stone Simulator 2021 you simply watch the change of day and night in the coniferous forest as a stone.

I made it because I wanted to try to release a fully completed "game", albeit a simple one.

I don't know what kind of computer is required for 60 fps, but it doesn't really matter, it's a stone simulator. Or a bunch of assets from the marketplace, whatever.
